name: binocular
description: Not exactly a telescope, but it's useful sometimes. Extension to search/navigate through files and workspaces.

binocular.general.additionalSearchLocati.markdownDescription: Search for files in these locations

binocular.command.externalTerminalCustom.markdownDescription: Command that will be used to open the terminal. Only applies when `#binocular.general.useExternalTerminal#` is `checked`. Default values are: **Mac:** `osascript -e 'tell app "Terminal" to do script "ls" & activate & do script "#;exit"`. **Window:** `start cmd /k "# & exit /s"`. **Linux:** `gnome-terminal -- sh -c "#"`. The __#__ is used for placeholder to the command that will be executed.

binocular.command.findFilesByNameInCurre.markdownDescription: Command to find files by name in the current working project. The __@__ is used as placeholder for the pwd command. Default values are: **Windows:** `%cd%`. **Other OS:** `$(pwd)`

binocular.command.findFilesByNameInAllWo.markdownDescription: Command to find files by name in all open projects. The __@__ is used as placeholder for the pwd command. Default values are: **Windows:** `%cd%`. **Other OS:** `$(pwd)`. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the folders parameters used in ripgrep/fd.

binocular.command.findFilesByNameInConfi.markdownDescription: Command to find files by name in all configured folders. The __@__ is used as placeholder for the pwd command. Default values are: **Windows:** `%cd%`. **Other OS:** `$(pwd)`. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the folders parameters used in ripgrep/fd.

binocular.command.findFilesByContentInCu.markdownDescription: Command to find files by content in the current working project. The __@__ is used as placeholder for the pwd command. Default values are: **Windows:** `%cd%`. **Other OS:** `$(pwd)`.

binocular.command.findFilesByContentInAl.markdownDescription: Command to find files by content in all open projects. The __@__ is used as placeholder for the pwd command. Default values are: **Windows:** `%cd%`. **Other OS:** `$(pwd)`. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the folders parameters used in ripgrep/fd.

binocular.command.findFilesByContentInCo.markdownDescription: Command to find files by content in all configured folders. The __@__ is used as placeholder for the pwd command. Default values are: **Windows:** `%cd%`. **Other OS:** `$(pwd)`. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the folders parameters used in ripgrep/fd.

binocular.command.addFolderToWorkspaceFr.markdownDescription: Command to add folder to workspace from configured folders. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the folders parameters used in ripgrep/fd.

binocular.command.changeToWorkspaceFromC.markdownDescription: Command to change to workspace from configured folders. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the folders parameters used in ripgrep/fd.

binocular.command.removeFoldersFromWorks.markdownDescription: Command to remove folders from workspace. The __#__ is used as placeholder for the workspaces open in vscode.
